description:
Ricardo Fellini is a regular competitor at the Gundam plastic model championship, and the representative for Italy. His other name is Italy`s Dandy Man. After arriving in Japan after traveling around the entire world, he has a fateful meeting with http://anidb.net/ch57668 [Reiji]. His hobby is searching for girls to hit on using Gundam plastic models, and he boasts that it has an 80% rate of success.
Source: ANN
name: Ricardo Fellini
